## Hierarchal clustering

```{r}
clusters <- hclust(dist(iris[, 3:4]), method = "complete")
plot(clusters)
clusterCut <- cutree(clusters, 3)
table(clusterCut, iris$Species)
abline(h=3,col="red")
```


```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.4, size = 3.5) + geom_point(col = clusterCut) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c('black', 'red', 'green'))
```

## Support Vector Machine

```{r}
set.seed(3920)
myiris2 = subset(iris, Species != "setosa")
myiris2$Species = factor(myiris2$Species)
svmsplit = sample.split(myiris2$Species, SplitRatio = 0.75)
training.set = subset(myiris2, svmsplit==TRUE)
test.set = subset(myiris2, svmsplit==FALSE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=myiris2,aes(x=Petal.Length,y=Petal.Width,color=Species))+geom_point(size=3)
```

```{r}
svmmodel = svm(factor(Species)~Petal.Width+Petal.Length, data=training.set, method="C-classification", kernal = "linear")
svmmodel
```

```{r}
newtrain = subset(training.set, select = c(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, Species))
plot(svmmodel, data = newtrain, formula=Petal.Width~Petal.Length)
```

```{r}
pred.training = predict(svmmodel,training.set)
mean(pred.training==training.set$Species)
```

```{r}
kern_svm=ksvm(Species~Petal.Width+Petal.Length, training.set, kernel="vanilladot")
kern_svm
```

```{r}
pred.test = predict(kern_svm, training.set)
mean(pred.test == training.set$Species)
```

```{r}
plot(kern_svm, data = training.set, formula = Petal.Width ~ Petal.Length)
```

## K-mean Clustering

```{r}
set.seed(3920)
kmi = kmeans(iris[,3:4],centers = 3, nstart = 15)
kmi
```

```{r}
kmi$tot.withinss
sum(kmi$withinss)
table(kmi$cluster,iris$Species)
```

```{r}
totwss = NULL
for(i in 2:15){
  totwss = append(totwss,kmeans(iris[,3:4], centers=i)$tot.withinss)
}
plot(x=2:15,y=totwss, type="b",xlab="Clusters",ylab="Total Within SS")
fviz_nbclust(iris[,3:4], kmeans,method="wss") + geom_vline(xintercept = 3, linetype=2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(iris,aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width,color=Species))+geom_point(size=4)+scale_color_manual(values=c("red","blue","green")) +
  geom_point(shape=1,size=4,color="black")
```

```{r}
ggplot(iris,aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width,color=as.factor(kmi$cluster)))+geom_point(size=4)+scale_color_manual(name="Cluster",values=c("red","blue","green")) +
  geom_point(shape=1,size=4,color="black")
```

```{r}
nkm = cbind(myiris,cluster=kmi$cluster)
class(nkm[,-5])
fviz_cluster(kmi, nkm[,-5], geom="point",show.clust.cent = TRUE,pointsize = 2)
```
